name: renderLoadingComponent
description: Provide your own component to show loading progress.

name: renderPickComponentTypeComponent
description:
Customize the display of component types on the editor modal, that your users
can pick from to add to their dashboards.

name: renderUndoIcon
description: Customize the 'undo' icon used on the dashboard.

name: renderCompletedIcon
description: Customize the 'completed' icon used on the dashboard.

name: renderInProgressIcon
description: Customize the 'in-progress' icon used on the dashboard.

name: renderDeleteIcon
description: Customize the 'delete' icon used for multiple purposes on the dashboard.

name: renderPlusIcon
description: Override the 'plus' icon where it's used on the dashboard.

name: renderCloseIcon
description: Override the 'close' icon where it's used on the dashboard.

name: renderFilterIcon
description: Override the icon used to represent filters on a component.

name: renderEditIcon
description: Override the 'edit' icon where it's used on the dashboard.

name: renderComponentOptionsMenuIcon
description: Override the icon used to the right of a component on the dashboard.

name: renderMergeCellIcon
description: Override the icon used to the right of a component on the dashboard.

name: renderSplitCellIcon
description: Provide a custom icon representing the ability to split tiles.

name: renderDownloadIcon
description: Override the 'download' icon where it's used on the dashboard.

name: renderInsertRowBelowIcon
description:
Customize the icon that represents inserting a new row below
the current row on the dashboard.

name: renderInsertRowAboveIcon
description:
Customize the icon that represents inserting a new row above
the current row on the dashboard.

name: renderAppendCellIcon
description: Customize the icon that adds a new tile to the row.

name: renderLibraryIcon
description: Customize the icon that represents managing the dashboard's library.

name: renderCreateComponentIcon
description:
Replace the icon that describes adding a new component directly to the 
dashboard.

name: renderAccordionIcon
description: Replace the icon used on accordions to show their open or closed state.
